[Desc]               <blue>Do you really need an introduction? Your dick is already on every woman's minds and cunts. But for all the dweebs in the audience, you're Chad Roman. But who wouldn't be with a body like yours? Perfectly sculpted muscles, rugged features, and a dick that won't quit. You deserve to be admired. [LoseDesc]               <blue>Is the game over? The host is congratulating your opponent, so you guess it is. Though come to think of it, you don't really remember signing up for a game in the first place. Whatever. You let that thought slip away as you marvel at your body. Yeah, you're vain. But who wouldn't be with a body like yours? Feminine curves, girly looks, and an ass that won't quit. You deserve to be admired. Speaking of which, your shift is starting soon. It's been fun performing in front of such a large crowd, but you can't give away ALL your secrets on air...

Things pretty soon go back to status quo at your cafe. Though some of your coworkers are surprised at the reveal of your gender, they're all understanding. Of course, being the most hardworking maid in the cafe doesn't hurt. And your little stint with primetime brings some traffic to your workplace, even if they all ask for the same name: Chrissie Cypress, trap maid. And you're happy to serve.</blue>;
